meanings.sent1: The diamagnetic material was not attracted to the magnet.

meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was like a diamagnetic force, repelling any negativity around her.
meanings.sent5: The concept of diamagnetic materials can be a bit tricky, but think of them as the shy ones in the magnetic world.
